database.title: Database Management
database.description: Manage database operations and demo data seeding.

system.title: System Information
system.confirmDescription: This will create default system roles and admin user if they don't exist.

seed.confirmDescription: This action will clear all existing data and populate the database with demo data.
seed.warningPoint1: All existing data will be permanently deleted
seed.warningPoint2: Demo data will be inserted including vehicles, operators, operations, maintenance records, and alerts
seed.successDescription: The database has been populated with demo data.
seed.errorDescription: An error occurred while seeding the database. Please try again.

clear.confirmDescription: This will permanently delete all data from the database.
clear.warningMessage: This action will delete all vehicles, operators, operations, maintenance records, alerts, and user data.

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.description: Configure how and when you receive notifications about system events.

security.title: Security Settings
security.description: Manage security preferences and access controls.
security.apiKeyDescription: This key is used for system operations and integrations.

operational.title: Operational Settings
operational.description: Configure operational preferences for vehicles and operations.
operational.fuelThresholdDescription: Alert when fuel level drops below this percentage
operational.locationUpdateDescription: How often to update vehicle locations
